title: Radiologist
responsibilities: Interpret medical images such as X-rays, MRIs, and CT scans.
Provide diagnoses and reports to referring physicians.
Ensure the highest standards of medical imaging are maintained.
Stay updated with the latest advancements in radiology.
requirements: MBBS & MD.
5-7 years of work experience.
Strong analytical and communication skills.
Proficiency in medical imaging technology.

title: X-Ray Technician
responsibilities: Operate X-ray equipment to produce images of the body for diagnostic purposes.
Explain procedures to patients and ensure their comfort and safety.
Maintain X-ray equipment and report any malfunctions.
Assist Radiologists in interpreting the images.
Ensure compliance with health and safety regulations.
requirements: Certification as an X-Ray Technician.
2-3 years of work experiece
Strong attention to detail.
Excellent patient care and communication skills.
Knowledge of health and safety standards in radiology.

title: Phlebotomist
responsibilities: Draw blood from patients for lab tests and donations.
Label and store blood samples accurately.
Maintain patient records.
Ensure compliance with health and safety regulations.
Provide excellent patient care and support.
requirements: Certification in Phlebotomy.
2-3 years of work experience in drawing blood and handling specimens.
Excellent patient care and communication skills.
Knowledge of health and safety standards.

title: Sales Manager
responsibilities: Develop and implement sales strategies to achieve company goals.
Analyze sales data and market trends to identify opportunities.
Build and maintain strong customer relationships.
Collaborate with other team members to optimize sales efforts.
requirements: 2-3 years of work exp in sales field.
Strong leadership and team management skills.
Excellent communication and negotiation skills.
Ability to analyze sales data and market trends.

title: Sales Executive
responsibilities: Identify and pursue new sales opportunities.
Present products and services to potential clients.
Negotiate contracts and close deals.
Achieve sales targets and contribute to team success.
requirements: 2-3 years of work exp in sales field.
Strong communication and negotiation skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field is beneficial.

title: Lab Technician
responsibilities: Perform laboratory tests and procedures.
Analyze test results and maintain accurate records.
Operate and maintain lab equipment.
Ensure compliance with health and safety regulations.
Collaborate with healthcare professionals to ensure accurate test results.
requirements: Certification as a Lab Technician.
Experience in a clinical laboratory setting.
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
Knowledge of laboratory health and safety standards.
